title: Evento Web Application Version
description: The web application version of the platform offers a versatile and accessible solution for event organizers. It combines the functionalities of the desktop and mobile versions, providing a seamless user experience across different devices. Organizers can create, promote, and manage events with ease, utilizing the platform's robust features and responsive design.

title: Power BI Dashboard
description: Analysis and visualization of factory production data with Power BI

title: Student Management Application

title: Evento Desktop Version
description: The desktop version of the platform provides organizers with a comprehensive toolkit to create, promote, and manage events of all sizes. It offers a user-friendly interface, powerful event management features, and seamless integration with other desktop applications.

title: Simple and Scientific Calculator
description: This is a simple and scientific calculator which can perform basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division depending upon the user input.

title: Evento Mobile Version
description: The mobile version of the platform allows organizers to access and manage their events on the go. With a responsive design and intuitive navigation, it enables event creation, promotion, and management from any mobile device, ensuring convenience and flexibility for organizers.

description: Caesar Cipher is one of the oldest encryption technique. In that application you will be able to encrypt text.
